markdownRemark.html:
As they were showing the backstory of Steve Kerr I was likeâ€¦ Not interested. But it totally cracked me up on when, right after winning the NBA final, Kerr goes to a podium and explains how the last shot came to be. Saying he has to bail Jordan out, again ðŸ˜‚

I also realized the backstory was necessary to show how crucial Steve Kerr was to the team. The high pressure 3-point shots, that takes balls of steel.
